item.description:
It's game 7, let's cheer on the Bruins to victory! We've reserved a private room in the back with a large screen TV to enjoy the game. Join us for appetizers, dinner and/or drinks at BuddaC. And since BuddaC is our current sponsor, we will also get 10% off the bill. 

Yes this is last minute, but how often do the Bruins get to the Stanley cup finals? And now it's game 7. We hope you can make it.

There is street parking nearby and you can also take the T (Green line C train) to BuddaC.
item.how_to_find_us: We have the back room reserved

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Bruins...Game 7...Join us!
